messages.nfcRequired: Tap an NFC tag to start
messages.nfcSubtitle: Hold your phone near the physical NFC tag on the garment.
messages.nfcDuplicateBody: This NFC tag is already linked to {{itemName}}. Do you want to open that item?
messages.nfcMissing: No item found for this tag. Would you like to register it?
messages.nfcUnsupported: Your device does not support NFC — TagTrack requires NFC to add items.
messages.nfcPermissionDenied: NFC permission denied. Enable it in Settings to add new items.
messages.offlineBlocked: Cannot register new tag while offline — please connect to internet.
messages.photoUploadFailed: Photo upload failed. You can retry from the item detail screen.
messages.cloudBackupDisabled: Cloud backup is disabled. Items are stored locally.
messages.cloudBackupEnabled: Cloud backup enabled. Items will sync to the cloud.

onboarding.step1Body: Link your wardrobe to NFC tags for effortless organization.
onboarding.step2Body: Hold your device near a garment's NFC tag to add it.
onboarding.step3Body: Cloud backup is optional and disabled by default.

settings.exportDescription: Download your wardrobe as JSON or CSV.
